package FebWeek4;

public class Assign3 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		for(int i=1;i<=5;i++) {
			for(int j=4;j>=i;j--) {
				System.out.print("*");
			}
			for(int r=1;r<(i*2);r++) {
				if((r>1) && (r<(i*2)-1)){
					System.out.print(" ");
				}
				else {
					System.out.print("*");
				}
				
			}
			System.out.println();
		}


	}

}
